episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and fascinating facts, including Bjorn Borg's unusual tennis comeback, shrews' brain-shrinking adaptation to winter, the peculiarities of copyright law involving divine entities, and the historical practice of training canaries to sing.

facts.fact: When 11-time Grand Slam tennis champion, Bjorn Borg, came out of retirement, he returned using a wooden racket and was coached by a 79-year-old karate expert from Wales.
Shrews cope with winter by shrinking their own brains.
According to US intellectual property law, you are not allowed to hold any copyrights if you are the Holy Spirit.
In the 18th century, you could hire a professional canary trainer to expand your canary's singing repertoire.
